QuestData.Title: The First Act of War
QuestData.Description:
Look around you, $p. This army is all that remains to defy the treachery of the other two houses.
I must regroup with the margrave and discuss strategy. War will soon be upon us.
I would ask that you prepare for the coming battle alongside the rest of our forces. We cannot afford for a single soldier to falter.
Seek out Baron Vyraz. He has earned countless victories for Maldraxxus. I fear his blades must soon be turned upon our former allies.
QuestData.RewardText: Mark my words, recruit. We will crush the other houses for their acts of treason.
